explanation: [0-0] On a city street, a red car adorned with vibrant flowers is parked, carrying a photo of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Several men in white, black, and blue attire stand atop the vehicle, one of them being Prime Minister Modi himself. He smiles, raising his hand towards the right. On the left side of the frame stands a gray building with red billboards, beneath which a crowd gathers, holding up placards bearing Modi's image. On the right side of the street stands a man with short hair, wearing black clothing and sunglasses.

[0-2] As the float slowly moves forward, Prime Minister Modi, standing on the roof, smiles and waves enthusiastically to the surrounding crowd. Meanwhile, a shower of golden petals is continuously tossed from the crowd on the right side of the road, while the short-haired man in black sunglasses on the left side walks alongside the float.

[0-2] As the float slowly moves forward, Prime Minister Modi, standing on the roof, smiles and waves enthusiastically to the surrounding crowd. Meanwhile, a shower of golden petals is continuously tossed from the crowd on the right side of the road, while the short-haired man in black sunglasses on the left side walks alongside the float.

[2-10] The scene then switches to two parts, upper and lower. The upper part shows the float continuing to move forward, while the lower part reveals the crowds on both sides of the road, packed beyond the guardrails, waving flags with enthusiasm. Inside the guardrails stand men in uniform, also holding flags. The crowd continues to shower golden petals, which fall onto the float and the welcoming crowd.
